passives.effects: Earn {{g|400}} through ''Shared Riches'' to automatically upgrade to {{ii|Runic Compass}}, gaining the ''Ward'' active with 3 wards in stock.
passives.name: Support Quest

passives.effects:
Grants a '''Shared Riches''' charge every 20 seconds, up to 3 charges. When an allied champion is within {{tip|er|icononly=true}} 1050 units of you, consume a charge in the following ways:
• Kill a minion by any means, granting you {{g|15}} and the nearest allied champion kill {{g|gold}}. Damaging a minion {{as|'''below''' {{rd|50%|30%}} of its '''maximum''' health}} {{tip|execute|executes}} it.
• Damage an enemy champion or structure with a basic attack or ability, granting you {{g|{{rd|22|20}}}}. A charge may be consumed this way only once per attack or ability.
passives.name: Shared Riches

passives.effects: Receives diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Receives {{ii|Lane Swap Detector}} penalties if detected within the top or middle [[lane]]s early in the game.
